text: Alexey Ivanovich Sorokin () (28 March 1922 – 4 March 2020) was a Soviet Admiral of the Fleet. He was a member of the Congress of People's Deputies of the Soviet Union. He was a political officer and studied at the Lenin Military-Political Academy between 1948 and 1952. Sorokin died on 4 March 2020 in Moscow at the age of 97.Адмирал флота Алексей Сорокин умер на 97-м году жизни ==Honours and awards== * Order of Lenin * Order of October Revolution * Order of the Patriotic War, 1st class, twice, and 2nd class * Order of the Red Banner of Labour * Order of the Red Star, twice * Order for Service to the Homeland in the Armed Forces of the USSR, 3rd class * Jubilee Medal "In Commemoration of the 100th Anniversary since the Birth of Vladimir Il'ich Lenin" * Medal "For the Victory over Germany in the Great Patriotic War 1941–1945" ==References== ==Other websites== *Page in Russian *Sorokin's personal web page in Russian Category:1922 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Soviet military people Category:Soviet politicians
title: Alexey Sorokin (admiral)
